name: RandoBots
description:
Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51. Rate now

An asymmetric duel between two robots that change form every 10 seconds. Attack, avoid and destroy in this high pace top-down shooter and bullet hell, alternately.

Credits:
Sahar Zehavi
Ido Adler
Ori Bruslovsky
Shaked Lotan
